x-codeSamples.label: javascript Axios

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: When the study began and ended

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Used to search for the study

parameters.name: principalinvestigator
parameters.description: Researcher who oversees multiple aspects of the study

parameters.name: site
parameters.description: Facility where study activities are conducted

parameters.name: sponsor
parameters.description: Organization that initiates and is legally responsible for the study

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: active | administratively-completed | approved | closed-to-accrual | closed-to-accrual-and-intervention | completed | disapproved | in-review | temporarily-closed-to-accrual | temporarily-closed-to-accrual-and-intervention | withdrawn

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

    <type value="searchset"/>
    <total value="1"/>
    <link>
        <relation value="self"/>
        <url value="http://burni.example.com/fhir/ResearchStudy?_offset=0&_count=100"/>
    </link>
    <entry>
        <fullUrl value="http://burni.example.com/fhir/ResearchStudy/c9d62f37-4ec7-4acc-aabd-3258537ea64e"/>
        <resource>
            <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><ResearchStudy xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir"><id value="09096c50-b97e-431a-a2dd-0a104988d77c"/><meta><versionId value="1"/><lastUpdated value="2022-02-17T17:34:55.950+08:00"/><tag><system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason"/><code value="HTEST"/><display value="test health data"/></tag></meta><status value="completed"/></ResearchStudy>
